flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: My middle-school math classes are currently exploring early flight (up to 1903).  In that study we are creating detailed assembly drawings for scaled models of (a) Cayley's 1849 Glider, (b) Otto Lilienthal's 1895 Flying Machine and (c) the Chanute-Herring
guide.title: Scaled Prints & Models of Early Gliders with Wind Tunnel Testing
